internalTypeName.description: The internal name of the type the attribute belongs to.

internalName.description: The internal name of the attribute, which is used in the database. Internal names usually contain only lowercase and uppercase letters and dots. They are similar to java package names.

localizedName.description: The localized name of the attribute, which is used in the user interface.

shortHelp.description: Short help text for the attribute, which explains the meaning of the attribute in a few words and is shown in the UI.

targetInternalTypeNames.description: The internal type name of the entity that is referenced by the attribute.

targetEntityClass.description: Specifies the class of the entity to which the reference points. It can have one of the following values: - 'cf.cplace.platform.assets.group.Group' if the target is a group, - 'cf.cplace.platform.assets.group.Person' if the target is a user, - 'cf.cplace.platform.assets.file.Document' if the target is a user, - 'cf.cplace.platform.assets.file.Page' otherwise.

isHierarchy.description: Specifies whether the reference is a hierarchy reference. If this is true, the reference points to a hierarchy of entities.

multiplicity.description: Specifies the multiplicity/cardinality of the attribute.
